allSaves.value: +1 status to all saves vs. magic, +2 status to all saves vs. mental

details.flavorText: Drow fighters train to master techniques that inflict deep, bleeding wounds and use poisoned crossbow bolts to exhaust enemies.

description.value:
You create a shroud of darkness that prevents light from penetrating or emanating within the area. Light does not enter the area and any non-magical light sources, such as a torch or lantern, do not emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the darkness. This also suppresses magical light of your darkness spell's level or lower. Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside. From outside, it appears as a globe of pure darkness.

Heightened Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness. They treat targets seen through the darkness as @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.
description.label: Description

description.value: All creatures in the area when you cast the spell are limned in colorful, heatless fire of a color of your choice for the duration. Visible creatures can't be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} while affected by faerie fire. If the creatures are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, they are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} while affected by faerie fire, rather than being @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}.
description.label: Description

description.value: You create up to four floating lights, no two of which are more than 10 feet apart. Each sheds light like a torch. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move any number of lights up to 60 feet. Each light must remain within 120 feet of you and within 10 feet of all others, or it winks out.
description.label: Description

description.value: When first exposed to bright light, the monster is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} until the end of its next turn. After this exposure, light doesnt blind the monster again until after it spends 1 hour in darkness. However, as long as the monster is in an area of bright light, its @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}.

Trigger A creature within the monsters reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action its using. Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesnt count toward the monsters multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesnt apply to this Strike.
The drow fighter draws a weapon using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} action, then Strikes with that weapon.

The drow fighter Strikes with its rapier, and gains a +1 circumstance bonus to the attack roll. A creature damaged by the attack takes 1d6 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent bleed Damage}.
